snippet: Further investigation showed the 40-year-old had not been in contact with the man who drove a truck into a Christmas fair, killing 12, the authorities said....
lead_paragraph: Further investigation showed the 40-year-old had not been in contact with the man who drove a truck into a Christmas fair, killing 12, the authorities said.

headline.main: Germany Releases Tunisian Held in Connection With Berlin Attack
headline.print_headline: Germans Release Tunisian  Held in Berlin Truck Attack
